name: Pepo Adventures
description:
I'm 15 years old, and I love games, and I love programming.
This is my first "game", actually it's more for pre-game, but it's there, if you want to help me and give your feedback I would be grateful.
For now the Game is only in my native language, PT-BR

-X-
Game Pepo Adventures v0.1 has only 2 phases, on the second finish line, nothing will happen, I am developing more phases.
